name: 陳香君
objective: This course is mainly to explore the methods of analyzing false information. Through this course, you will learn the techniques of analyzing false information, such as abnormal information, social engineering, propagation path and deep fake, including semantic analysis, account identification analysis and propagation path. Analysis of the impact of false information.
schedule:
Wk1: Overview
Wk2: Introduction of the false information
Wk3-5: Text Analysis Methods for Misinformation
Wk6-8: Social engineering (Types & Methods)
Wk9-12: Propagation Path analysis (Method and techniques)  
Wk13-15: Network traffic analysis and tools introduction
Wk16-18: Project presentation and case study
